mapper.update: update user_recharge set createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, organId = #{organid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rechargeCount = #{rechargecount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `createUser` = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, createTime, deleted, manager, money, organId, rechargeCount, remark, `type`, `createUser` from user_recharge where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, createTime, deleted, manager, money, organId, rechargeCount, remark, `type`, `createUser` from user_recharge
